# UserResetDevice

**Instance Method**

Performs a bus reset of the external drive.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t UserResetDevice(SCSIServiceResponse * response);
```

## Parameters

- **response**: A pointer to a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/iokit/scsiserviceresponse] instance. On return, the framework populates this reference with the response from the protocol driver.

## Return Value

A value that indicates the result of the bus reset. [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] indicates success. For error definitions, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/iokit/iokit_constants].

## Managing the device

- **UserDetermineDeviceCharacteristics**: Performs enumeration-time initializations in response to a call from the framework.
